entities.name: george
entities.description: George is introduced as one of the twins who are identical to Harry. He says 'I'm George' and later reveals that he's actually Fred yanking his wand.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is introduced as one of the twins who are identical to Harry. He says 'I'm only yanking your wand. I'm Fred really'.

entities.name: moody
entities.description: Moody is introduced as a person who is pointing at George and Fred, trying to tell them apart.

entities.name: remus
entities.description: Remus is mentioned by Moody as the person that one of the twins (George or Fred) is with.

entities.name: miss delacour
entities.description: Miss Delacour is introduced as a person who is going on a thestral ride with Bill.

entities.name: bill
entities.description: Bill is introduced as a person who is taking Fleur on a thestral ride.

entities.name: fleur
entities.description: Fleur is introduced as a person who is going on a thestral ride with Bill.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned throughout the conversation and is one of the twins (George or Fred) that Moody is trying to tell apart.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is introduced as a person who is going on a thestral ride with Kingsley.

entities.name: kingsley
entities.description: Kingsley is introduced as a person who is going on a thestral ride with Hermione.

entities.name: tonks
entities.description: Tonks is introduced as a person who is waving at Ron and saying 'Which leaves you and me, Ron!'

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned by Tonks as the person she's with.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is introduced as a person who is going on a bike ride with Harry.

relationships.description: Moody is pointing at George, trying to tell them apart.
Moody is pointing at Fred, trying to tell them apart.
Bill is taking Fleur on a thestral ride.
Miss Delacour is going on a thestral ride with Bill.
Hermione is going on a thestral ride with Kingsley.
Hagrid is going on a bike ride with Harry.
